ygData.subject: Re: A Good place to hunt or quest for lv
ygData.msgSnippet: Oasis of Marr. I hate the place personally, but it is really good exp at level 15. I have 3 alts around that level currently and haven t really found a zone
ygData.messageBody:
Oasis of Marr. I hate the place personally, but
it is really good exp at level 15. I have 3 alts
around that level currently and haven't really found a
zone that is easier to level in than Oasis.. It is
good to solo in and there are also plenty of people to
group with. <br>other ideas to try out - lavastorm,
najena, befallen, everfrost, the warrens... Maybe the
prisoners in highkeep too I'm not sure what level they are
but I remember fighting them at 14 with my cleric.
=)<br>anyway g'luck<br>~Laura~<br>(Mokas, 51 bardy, Ayonae Ro)
